headline: Eaton completes acquisition of Fibrebond
summary: DUBLIN, April 01, 2025--Intelligent power management company Eaton (NYSE:ETN) today announced it has completed the acquisition of Fibrebond, a designer and builder of pre-integrated modular power enclosures. Under the terms of the agreement, Eaton paid $1.4 billion for Fibrebond, which is expected to generate $110 million of estimated 2025 adjusted EBITDA. Eaton expects the deal will be neutral from an earnings per share standpoint in 2025.
